title: Conditional Task Template
description: A reusable template for conditional workflows: define a condition, specify then/else actions with expected outputs, declare variables, and add validation criteria and notes.
prompt:
<promptTemplate>
  <conditionalTask>
    <scenario>
      <condition expression='[Insert condition here]'>
        <then>
          <action>[Define action if condition is true]</action>
          <expectedOutput>[Expected result when true]</expectedOutput>
        </then>
        <else>
          <action>[Define action if condition is false]</action>
          <expectedOutput>[Expected result when false]</expectedOutput>
        </else>
      </condition>
    </scenario>

    <variables>
      <variable name='audience'>[Target audience]</variable>
      <variable name='goal'>[Desired outcome]</variable>
      <variable name='context'>[Optional: Additional context]</variable>
    </variables>

    <validation>
      <criteria>[Define how to check if the conditional task succeeded]</criteria>
    </validation>

    <notes>
      [Optional: Add clarifications, rules, or edge case handling]
    </notes>
  </conditionalTask>
</promptTemplate>
